Plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.
Title: Get Shorty
Actors: John Travolta, Gene Hackman, Rene Russo, Danny DeVito
tomatoConsensus: With a perfect cast and a sly twist on the usual Hollywood gangster dynamic, Get Shorty delivers a sharp satire that doubles as an entertaining comedy-thriller in its own right.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 15 nominations.
